name: Objkt #1tribute to Sir, with love - sir sidney poitier
description: rip. a legend. poitier was born unexpectedly in miami while his parents were visiting. his birth was two months premature, and he was not expected to survive. he lived with his family on cat island until he was 10. he was a bahamian-american actor, film director, activist, and ambassador. in 1964, he won the academy award for best actor. his fire pierced my heart when i saw his 1967 film "to Sir, with love". the film's title song sung by lulu, was the best-selling single in the United States of that year.
